content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":106421,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ガキにモテてもな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even if I'm popular with kids...\""},{"lineNumber":106422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺は仕事で疲れてるのだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm tired from work,"},{"lineNumber":106423,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんまり付き合えんぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I can't hang out much.\""},{"lineNumber":106424,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh?\""},{"lineNumber":106425,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もっと遊ぼーよー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's play more!\""},{"lineNumber":106426,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe...\""},{"lineNumber":106427,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルは家事の最中に、","translatedEnglishLine":"While Syiru was quiet."},{"lineNumber":106429,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":106430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐがー、ぐがー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Snore, snore...\""},{"lineNumber":106431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐうぐう、ぐうぐう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Zzz, zzz...\""},{"lineNumber":106432,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すやぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Snooze...\""},{"lineNumber":106433,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は眠っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others were asleep."},{"lineNumber":106434,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よい、しょ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, there...\""},{"lineNumber":106435,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルは大きくて薄手のシーツをふわりと広げて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Syiru gently spread a large, thin sheet,"},{"lineNumber":106436,"originalJapaneseLine":"そっと優しくみんなにかけた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and gently covered everyone with it."},{"lineNumber":106437,"originalJapaneseLine":"「みんな、よく寝てる……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone is sleeping so soundly...\""},{"lineNumber":106438,"originalJapaneseLine":"傍に腰掛けて、シィルがランスの顔を覗き込む。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sitting beside them, Syiru peeked at Rance's opened his eyelids with a snap, and their eyes met."},{"lineNumber":106444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":106445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……寒い、お前も来い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's cold, you come here too.\""},{"lineNumber":106446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、きゃっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, kyah...\""},{"lineNumber":106447,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルはランスの横に寝転がらせされてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Syiru ended up lying down next to Rance."},{"lineNumber":106448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"R-Rance-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":106449,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もっと寄れ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come closer.\""},{"lineNumber":106450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, uh...\""},{"lineNumber":106451,"originalJapaneseLine":"小脇に抱えられたシィルが、","translatedEnglishLine":"Held under his arm, Syiru"},{"lineNumber":106452,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドキドキとランスを見上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"looked up at Rance, her heart pounding."},{"lineNumber":106453,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルがもぞもぞと身じろぎして、","translatedEnglishLine":"Syiru fidgeted slightly,"},{"lineNumber":106454,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの腕を枕にする。","translatedEnglishLine":"and rested her head on Rance's arm like a pillow."},{"lineNumber":106455,"originalJapaneseLine":"（…………）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...) "},{"lineNumber":106456,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……幸せ）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...So happy.)"},{"lineNumber":106457,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぽかぽかと日は暖かい。","translatedEnglishLine":"The sun was warm and cozy."},{"lineNumber":106458,"originalJapaneseLine":"未だ戦争続く中、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though the war still continued,"},{"lineNumber":106459,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は束の間の休息、みんなでお昼寝した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others took a brief rest and napped together."},{"lineNumber":106460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はふー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hafu...\""},{"lineNumber":106461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とってもいいお湯ですね、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The water's really nice, Rance-sama.\""},{"lineNumber":106462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、俺様の城の温泉なんだから当然だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, of course, it's the hot spring of my castle.\""},{"lineNumber":106463,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスとシィルの二人は温泉に入っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and Syiru were soaking in the hot spring."},{"lineNumber":106464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毎日温泉に入れるなんて、贅沢ですね、ランス様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Being able to bathe in the hot spring every day is such a luxury, Rance-sama.\""},{"lineNumber":106465,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、中々悪くない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it's not bad at all."},{"lineNumber":106466,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほんげーほんげー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hongē hongē.\""},{"lineNumber":106467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ちゃかちゃかちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Chaka Chaka-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":106468,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの歌にシィルが合いの手を入れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Syiru added an interjection to Rance's song."},{"lineNumber":106469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーれ、ぴゅっぴゅっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There, pyu pyu!\""},{"lineNumber":106470,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが手で水鉄砲を作り、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance made a water pistol shape with his hands,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんまり付き合えんぞー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I can't hang out much."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルは家事の最中に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While Syiru was in the middle of housework,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと周囲が静かになっていることに気づいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she suddenly noticed that everything around had gone quiet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は眠っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others were asleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルは大きくて薄手のシーツをふわりと広げて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru gently spread a large, thin sheet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっと優しくみんなにかけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gently covered everyone with it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傍に腰掛けて、シィルがランスの顔を覗き込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sitting beside them, Syiru peeked at Rance's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パチリと瞼を開いたランスとシィルの目が合う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance opened his eyelids with a snap, and their eyes met.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルはランスの横に寝転がらせされてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru ended up lying down next to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小脇に抱えられたシィルが、
ドキドキとランスを見上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: looked up at Rance, her heart pounding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルがもぞもぞと身じろぎして、
ランスの腕を枕にする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and rested her head on Rance's arm like a pillow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽかぽかと日は暖かい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sun was warm and cozy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は束の間の休息、みんなでお昼寝した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others took a brief rest and napped together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とってもいいお湯ですね、ランス様」
「がははは、俺様の城の温泉なんだから当然だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, of course, it's the hot spring of my castle."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとシィルの二人は温泉に入っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Syiru were soaking in the hot spring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「毎日温泉に入れるなんて、贅沢ですね、ランス様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Being able to bathe in the hot spring every day is such a luxury, Rance-sama."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの歌にシィルが合いの手を入れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syiru added an interjection to Rance's song.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが手で水鉄砲を作り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance made a water pistol shape with his hands,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
